boat.name: Ancilla
boat.full_description:
'Ancilla' is based on an earlier boat of the same name 'built in the early 1930s.

The original Ancilla was a double ended timber motor yacht who served as the ceremonial yacht of the Lord Mayor of London. She originally had steadying sails but these were replaced with a small gaff rig in the 1990s. She became derelict and was replaced by Ancilla ll now called just 'Ancilla'.

The original above waterline profile has been preserved but below the waterline the design has been updated for improved performance and handling. The original shape of the original Ancilla below the water had been lost.
boat.construction_details: Double ender, round chine steel, wooden decks.
boat.short_description: 'Ancilla' is a steel built yacht built in 1996 to replace the original Ancilla, built in the 1930s.
